event.story_middle: An embittered pregnant widow embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family after she loses her own child.

event.title: Ez Money
event.performer: Danny Dyer, Tamer Hassan, Ray Panthaki
event.story_middle: A mischievous kid, with a knack for computers, has her super sleuth skills put to the test when a group of con artists kidnap her best friend Echo.

event.title: Crimes of Fashion
event.story_middle: A creative and hard-working fashion student, who has always dreamt of becoming a fashion designer, is thrilled to finally be on her way. But, when the grandfather she never knew about passes away, her life is suddenly turned upside down.

event.title: Sounder
event.story_middle: This film is based during the Depression era of the South it tells the coming of age story of a boy who is on a quest to find his father. The stray dog Sounder, becomes an emblem of the belief and affection that helps the boy endure his fate

event.title: Dark Rage
event.story_middle: A serial killer's life rapidly unravels when a young couple with problems of their own, move into his apartment building.

event.title: Tombstone
event.story_middle: A successful lawman tries to put his violent past behind him, but when a murderous gang called the Cowboys bursts onto the scene, it leaves him with no option but to take up his badge and gun once more.

event.title: Sorority Row
event.performer: Briagna Evigan, Jamie Chung, Rumer Willis
event.story_middle: When a prank goes terribly wrong and one of their own is killed, a group of sorority sisters cover up the death, and vow to never to speak of the tragedy again. Their past soon comes back to haunt them in the form of serial killer out for revenge.

event.title: No Good Deed
event.performer: Samuel L Jackson, Stellan Skarsgard, Milla Jovovich
event.story_middle: A police detective stumbles upon a bizarre band of criminals about to pull off a bank robbery, whilst searching for a runaway teenager.

event.title: Nevada
event.story_middle: Chrysty arrives on foot in a town called Silver City, Nevada. She meets the local women of the town, they however find out that Chrysty left her husband and three children and McGill calls West, Chrysty's husband to tell him to come get her.

event.title: Beautiful Girl
event.story_middle: Becca and Adam announce that they are getting married, money is tight and Becca enters a beauty pageant which prize is a free trip to Hawaii, Becca wants the prize as a honeymoon. Amanda, Becca's mother is not happy about her entering the competition

event.title: The Princess Diaries
event.story_middle: A socially awkward teenager's life takes a dramatic turn when she learns that she is the sole heir to the throne of a small European nation called Genovia.

event.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
event.story_middle: Princess Mia now faces a new revelation: In order to succeed her grandmother as Queen of Genovia, she must first get married, or her family stand a chance of losing the crown!

event.title: Hurly Burly
event.story_middle: In this adaptation of David Rabe's play, set in the Hollywood hills the dysfunctional personal lives of Hollywood movers and shakers are being dissected and prove to be more interesting than anything else.

event.title: You Belong to Me
event.story_middle: A young New York architect becomes the object of obsession for an eccentric landlady, when he moves into a new apartment.

event.title: What Love Sees
event.story_middle: Based on a true story this drama covers fifteen years in the lives of totally blind Gordon Holly and Jean Treadway. Gordon is a humble rancher and Jean a daughter of wealth. Against all odds they marry and raise their four children on Gordon's ranch

event.title: Payback
event.story_middle: One night while closing her restaurant a women sees a suspicious man outside and calls the police. To her horror one of the policemen viscously assaults the man. She is urged to report the incident and becomes the target of the rogue cops revenge.

event.title: Scorpio Men on Prozac
event.story_middle: Scorpio Men on Prozac is a satirical film about a group of Scorpio males, aged between sixteen and thirty, who for various emotional, sexual and romantic reasons are taking the anti-depressant Prozac.

event.title: Road to Nowhere
event.story_middle: Desperate to get away from things, a woman finds herself in a dead-end, coastal town in Florida. In Philadelphia, a pair of detectives and a sleazy reporter struggle to unravel the mysterious home-invasion murder of a wealthy couple, and try to locate their missing daughter.
